segments.text: Well , I'm trying to buy some foreign currency for my holiday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can help you with that . Holiday , you say ? Lucky you ! Where are you going to be travelling to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are going to Macau to visit my niece . She said it's better for me to bring US dollars , is that right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is one option , Madam . If your are travelling to either Hong Kong or Macau we are permitted to exchange up to 1,000 USD for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I see . What's the exchange rate ? Is the dollar up or down ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Today's rate is 823 . 71 RIB to 100 USD .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be honest , I have no idea about these things ! But I'm sure that's alright .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's not bad . I will need to see your passport though .
segments.speaker: S1
